translation.en: [woman] Angelina!
♪ We can run, we can run ♪
[woman] Angelina!
Flawless as always.
translation.zh: 一如既往 完美无瑕

translation.en: Our spacing was completely off.
And that pose at the end still isn't strong enough.
translation.zh: 最后的姿势还是不够有力

translation.en: [sighs] Always the perfectionist.
translation.zh: 一如既往 完美主义

translation.en: So, what do we got?
Press junket's up next.
-Be nice. -Always.
-[woman] Let me introduce you to-- -Angelina Costa.
translation.zh: 我给你介绍一下… 安吉丽娜科斯塔麦迪森斯帕克斯 《明星流行新闻》

translation.en: Madison Sparks, Celeb Buzzpop News.
translation.zh: 安吉丽娜科斯塔麦迪森斯帕克斯 《明星流行新闻》

translation.en: It is, like, a total honor to meet you.
translation.zh: 真的 能见到你 实在是太荣幸了

translation.en: I have been a fan since I was a baby.
translation.zh: 我从婴儿时期就是你的粉丝了

translation.en: A baby? Really?
The industry has changed a lot since your first single.
translation.zh: 从你的首支单曲至今行业已经发生了翻天覆地的变化

translation.en: Like how your labelmate Cheri Bibi utilized Twitter
translation.zh: 跟你同公司的谢莉碧碧

translation.en: to put momentum behind her latest single.
translation.zh: -利用推特为她的新单曲造势-是啊

translation.en: Yeah. She certainly is very innovative.
translation.zh: -利用推特为她的新单曲造势-是啊 她确实很有创新精神

translation.en: Totes.
Well, do you find it difficult to stay on top of current trends?
translation.zh: 那么 你会不会觉得要跟上当前的潮流有些力不从心？

translation.en: I'm just wondering if it's difficult to stay relevant.
translation.zh: 我就是好奇要保持热度是不是很困难

translation.en: For example, recently, you put out a TikTok that felt a little…
translation.zh: 比如说 你最近发布的一段抖音感觉就有点…

translation.en: …outdated. [chuckles]
Is there pressure to keep up with these younger artists?
translation.zh: 要赶上这些年轻艺人的步伐会不会压力很大？

translation.en: Esta idiota.
What was that?
Oh. I love your shoes.
[Madison] Oh.
[Angelina] She asked about the TikTok, Mo.
translation.zh: 她居然问抖音的事 小莫

translation.en: The TikTok!
I mean, she… She pretty much told me that I should retire to my face.
translation.zh: 我是说 她几乎是当面叫我快点退休

translation.en: Who cares what she thinks?
You have a shoot to be on the cover of Fashion Beat magazine tomorrow.
translation.zh: 你明天还要去拍《时尚节拍》的封面

translation.en: That's what you need to be focused on.
translation.zh: 这才是你需要关心的事

translation.en: -Right. Yeah. -All right. Okay.
-Yeah. -[ringtone plays]
-Oh. -Yes.
Right. [sighs]
It's Barry.
Mmm. Mmm, don't get it.
But he's the head of the label. I have to take it.
translation.zh: 但他是唱片公司的老板 我必须接啊

translation.en: Well, Mo, just tell him I'm not here.
translation.zh: 好吧…小莫 告诉他我不在

translation.en: -I don't know. Make something up. -Okay. [shushing]
translation.zh: -我不知道 随便编点什么-好吧

translation.en: Barry! Hi.
Hey, Monique. I was hoping I can catch a moment with Angie.
translation.zh: 嘿 莫妮克 我想跟安吉聊两句

translation.en: You know, you just missed her.
translation.zh: 话说 你刚好错过她了

translation.en: She's off to a fitting for tomorrow's shoot.
translation.zh: 她为了明天的拍摄去试服装了

translation.en: [Barry] Great, great.
I had a thought. Ange should make a Christmas song.
translation.zh: 我有个想法 小安应该录一首圣诞歌

translation.en: Christmas songs are good for business.
-[whispering] No, no, no. -Christmas is a few weeks away, Barry.
translation.zh: -不行-还有几周就是圣诞节了 巴里

translation.en: And I'm not sure that a Christmas song really fits Angelina's whole thing.
translation.zh: 而且我不确定圣诞歌是否适合安吉丽娜的调调

translation.en: What? Look what it did for Mariah.
translation.zh: 什么？你看看它给玛丽亚带来了什么

translation.en: That one song alone can buy her a private island.
translation.zh: 那一首歌就够让她买座私人小岛了

translation.en: Don't you worry. We've been working on some new material,
translation.zh: 不用担心 我们已经在着手弄新歌了

translation.en: and I think she has a hit.
translation.zh: 我觉得她有一首会火爆的歌

translation.en: [Barry] Okay. So when can I hear something?
translation.zh: 好吧 那我什么时候能听到？

translation.en: You can hear it on Sunday at the gala.
translation.zh: 你可以在周日的晚会上听到

translation.en: [Barry] Okay. All right, well, just make sure she delivers. Yeah?
translation.zh: 行 那好吧确保她能交货就行 好吗？

translation.en: -Of course. Of course. Okay. Bye. -[softly] No! No!
translation.zh: -当然啦 好了 再见-不行！

translation.en: Why'd you tell him we have a song?
translation.zh: 你为什么跟他说我有新歌？

translation.en: We don't have a song. I've literally been rehearsing my hits.
translation.zh: 我们没有新歌我一直在排练我的热门歌

translation.en: Mo, I have not been feeling inspired,
translation.zh: 小莫 我最近没有灵感

translation.en: and I don't-- I mean, I don't really think that a Christmas song is my style.
translation.zh: 而且我不…我真的觉得圣诞歌不是我的风格

translation.en: And… [chuckles] …it's not like the record label's gonna drop me
translation.zh: 反正唱片公司不会放弃我

translation.en: because I don't want a "Jingle Bell Rock."
translation.zh: 就因为我不愿唱《铃儿响叮当》

translation.en: Are you serious?
Wait.
Are you telling me that Barry gets a shiny new toy,
translation.zh: 你是在告诉我巴里搞到了一个闪亮的新玩具

translation.en: and he would kick this to the curb?
translation.zh: 所以我就会被他弃如敝履？

translation.en: Well, that shiny new toy has a top-ten single right now.
translation.zh: 好吧 那个闪亮的新玩具现在有一首排名前十的单曲

translation.en: My advice?
Shoot.
Stop rehashing your old hits.
translation.zh: 别再排练以前的热门歌曲了

translation.en: Get in touch with your inner Holly Jolly,
translation.zh: 跟你内心的“欢乐圣诞节”交流一下

translation.en: and write a new hit single that he can release this Christmas.
translation.zh: 写一首爆款新单让他能在圣诞节发布

translation.en: -Mommy? -[gasps in surprise, exclaims]
Could we turn the telenovela down, please?
translation.zh: 拜托我们能把电视声音关小一点吗？

translation.en: No way!
Ricardo just got up from the dead!
translation.zh: 里卡多刚刚才死而复生！

translation.en: -Yeah, that's more important. -[Mommy sighs]
translation.zh: 是啊 这事更重要些

translation.en: Cristina!
Sweetheart, can you please turn it off?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 能拜托你把它关掉吗？

translation.en: Between your music and your grandmother blaring the TV,
translation.zh: 在你的音乐和你奶奶震耳欲聋的电视声之间

translation.en: I can barely hear myself think.
translation.zh: 我几乎连自己的思想都听不见了

translation.en: Anyways, can you please play the guitar on my video?
translation.zh: 不管怎样 求你啦你能在我的视频里弹吉他吗？

translation.en: -No. -Aw, please?
No.
Please?
I'll frame you out. You won't even be in it. Okay?
translation.zh: 我不会拍到你的你都不会出镜的 好吗？

translation.en: [sighs heavily] You better.
Yes! [laughs]
I miss you, Ma. [kisses]
♪ No matter where you go ♪
♪ I'll always keep you with me ♪
translation.zh: 我会永远把你放在心上

translation.en: ♪ And I know ♪
♪ Your love is here to stay ♪
♪ I'll always keep you with me ♪
♪ And I'll always ♪
♪ Have a place in my heart ♪
♪ Where you stay ♪
That song was by Angelina Costa.
translation.zh: 这首歌是安吉丽娜科斯塔的

translation.en: -Who-- Well, who doesn't know who she is. -[laughs]
[sighs] My mom and I used to listen to that song a lot together.
translation.zh: 我妈妈和我以前经常一起听这首歌

translation.en: My mom passed away a few years ago.
translation.zh: 几年前 我妈妈去世了

translation.en: Um, I'm gonna use it in my quinceañera next week,
translation.zh: 下周 我会在我的15岁成人礼上唱这首歌

translation.en: so it feels like she's there.
My Christmas birthday wish is to one day meet Angelina.
translation.zh: 我的圣诞生日愿望是有一天能见到安吉丽娜

translation.en: Maybe take a selfie with her.
translation.zh: 也许再跟她一起拍张自拍

translation.en: And tell her how much her song means to me.
translation.zh: 告诉她 她的歌对我来说是多么重要

translation.en: Ah, there she is!
Smile for the camera, mi amor.
translation.zh: 对着镜头笑一笑 亲爱的

translation.en: Ricardo! What a surprise.
Uh, well, hey there, everyone.
I plan on having some new music for you very soon.
translation.zh: 我计划很快为你们奉上我的新歌

translation.en: Oh. Well, what about a little bit of, uh… inspiration?
translation.zh: 噢 那先来点小灵感怎么样啊？

translation.en: Oh. Pues por supuesto.
[Angelina] Okay. Mmm.
-Merry Christmas to me. -Oh. [chuckles] Okay.
translation.zh: 祝我圣诞快乐 好了

translation.en: -We have it? -What're you doing here?
Baby, what? I can't resist this.
translation.zh: 宝贝 干嘛？这种事我无法拒绝啊

translation.en: You know, the behind-the-scenes content always lights people up.
translation.zh: 你知道的 幕后花絮总是能让大家欢呼雀跃

translation.en: No, no, no. Stop. Stop.
No, we agreed.
Baby, we got 15 million followers that are hungry for content.
translation.zh: 宝贝 我们有1500万粉丝如饥似渴地盼着我们更新内容呢

translation.en: Plus, we need some extra footage to promote the gala.
translation.zh: 而且我们还需要一些额外的视频来宣传我们的晚会

translation.en: No, the gala? That's not what the event is about.
translation.zh: 不 晚会？晚会的重点根本不是这些

translation.en: It's about the charity, not us.
translation.zh: 它的重点是慈善事业 不是我们

translation.en: [Ricardo] I'm on your side, okay?
translation.zh: 我是站在你这边的 好吗？

translation.en: -Right? -Yeah.
-Ricalina. -Mm-hmm. -Ha ha! It's good for both of us. -Right.
translation.zh: -里卡丽娜 这对我们俩都有好处-是啊

translation.en: -Yes? -Yes.
-Yes? -Yes! Yeah. Ricalina.
translation.zh: -对吗？-对！ 对 里卡丽娜

translation.en: -That's a yes. That's a yes. That's a yes. -Okay.
See you later, Mo.
-Catch up with you. -[Angelina] Yep.
[Ricardo] Bye.
What?
I thought Ricalina was going public with the breakup.
translation.zh: 我以为里卡丽娜要对外宣布分手的事呢

translation.en: We can't.
We can't!
He's right. Not yet.
translation.zh: 他说得对 还不是时候

translation.en: We got to get our numbers up.
We have 15 million. We need 200.
translation.zh: 我们现在有1500万 我们需要2000万

translation.en: We got to get those Beyoncé numbers.
translation.zh: 我们得追上碧昂斯的粉丝数

translation.en: Whatever.
-[groaning] Dad, where's my phone? -Where did you leave it?
translation.zh: -爸爸 我的手机呢？-你把它放哪里了？

translation.en: Mijo, if she knew where she left it, it wouldn't be lost.
translation.zh: 儿子 要是她知道自己把它放哪里了 那它就不会不见了

translation.en: [sighs] Ooh, what are you making?
[Dad] Pozole!
Mmm, it smells so good. [chuckles]
Here it is.
Yay!
[sighs] It's dead.
-Oh. It's a Christmas miracle. -[chuckles]
Come on, we're gonna be late. Love you, Mama.
translation.zh: 快点 我们要迟到了 爱你 妈妈

translation.en: -Adiós. -Bye, Abuela!
Girl! That outfit is fire.
translation.zh: 妞儿！ 这套衣服好劲爆

translation.en: I mean, I knew it was gonna look good, but seeing it on you?
translation.zh: 我知道会很好看 但看到你穿着它…

translation.en: -You are working it. -Thank you.
Yeah, I am feeling it.
translation.zh: 是啊 我都已经来感觉了

translation.en: You should.
I was actually going to order lunch. You want anything?
translation.zh: 我正准备订午餐 你要吃什么吗？

translation.en: Oh, absolutely not.
With the performance coming up, I got to stay strict. [exhales]
translation.zh: 不久后就要演出了 我得严格控制

translation.en: You wanna talk about it?
Uh, yeah, sure. I plan on doing a lettuce diet up until the gala.
translation.zh: 当然 我计划在晚会前都吃生菜减脂餐

translation.en: Hold on. What is a lettuce diet?
translation.zh: 慢着 生菜减脂餐是什么？

translation.en: It's when you only eat lettuce.
But you alternate by day the kind of lettuce you eat.
translation.zh: 但是每天都会吃不同种类的生菜

translation.en: It's much more exciting than it sounds.
translation.zh: 其实比听起来更让人有食欲

translation.en: -Mo? -[Monique] Huh?
The transition from arugula to spring mix
translation.zh: 从芝麻菜到春季什锦的转变

translation.en: makes your whole week.
translation.zh: 让你整个星期都很开心

translation.en: Okay, no more distractions, deflections, excuse me, or arugula.
translation.zh: 好吧 别再分心偏题了不好意思 也别提芝麻菜了

translation.en: Venga. Sit down.
Come on.
Talk to me.
My head is just not in it, Mo.
translation.zh: 我的心思不在这里 小莫

translation.en: Okay, I'm not feeling it. I…
translation.zh: 好吗 我并没有感觉

translation.en: I mean, you know I haven't felt Christmas since…
translation.zh: 你知道我很久没感受过圣诞节了 自从…

translation.en: -Well, you know, Ma passed. -[softly] I know.
translation.zh: -你知道的 妈妈过世之后-我知道

translation.en: And now they want me to write a Christmas song. Seriously?
translation.zh: 但现在他们要我写圣诞歌 真的吗？

translation.en: Ho ho ho, deck the halls.
No, it's not happening.
Okay, let's go.
[Monique] You look beautiful.
-We have to make this tighter. -No… We… I don't…
translation.zh: -我们得再收紧点-不…我们…不了

translation.en: -[sighs] Wait, do I have muffin top? -I'm not even answering that.
translation.zh: -我的肉有没有溢出来？-我甚至不想回答你

translation.en: -I can pinch. I'm pinching. -You're not pinching. Please.
translation.zh: -我可以再收紧点的 我要把它收紧-拜托别再收紧了

translation.en: -Angie. -Barry.
-What are you doing here? -Hey.
I figured I'd come by and chat with you in person.
translation.zh: 我想着过来找你聊聊呢

translation.en: Is this about the song? 'Cause I've actually been working on the song,
translation.zh: 是关于那首歌吗？ 我一直在写那首歌 进展非常顺利

translation.en: and it's coming along great.
translation.zh: 我一直在写那首歌 进展非常顺利

translation.en: I would absolutely love to discuss the song. But first, Cheri!
translation.zh: 我非常乐意跟你讨论那首歌但首先 谢莉！

translation.en: You've met Cheri Bibi before, yes?
translation.zh: 你们之前见过谢莉碧碧吧？

translation.en: We haven't had the pleasure.
Oh my gosh. It is wild to meet you.
translation.zh: 天啊 见到你真是太好了

translation.en: Likewise.
And look at your outfit.
I don't think I could ever pull off anything so vintage.
translation.zh: 我觉得我永远都穿不出这么复古的衣服

translation.en: You… Why… Why don't you talk to the photographers and let Angie and I finish up?
translation.zh: 不如你去找摄影师聊聊让我和安吉聊完

translation.en: Oh, of course.
So wonderful to meet you. I cannot wait to hear the new single.
translation.zh: 见到你实在是太开心了 我已经等不及想听你的新歌了

translation.en: [Barry] You a star, girl!
translation.zh: 你是最亮的星 妞儿！

translation.en: -Isn't she something? -[Angelina] Yeah, yeah, yeah, she sure is.
translation.zh: -她是不是很棒？-是的 毫无疑问

translation.en: What did you mean by go talk to the photographer?
translation.zh: 你说“去找摄影师聊聊”是什么意思？

translation.en: You and I need to talk about some shifts.
translation.zh: 你跟我需要聊聊换班的事

translation.en: Shifts?
It feels like the focus is in your past, and the label really wants to project
translation.zh: 感觉你的关注点主要是在你的过去 唱片公司想要塑造出一个未来的形象

translation.en: an image of the future.
translation.zh: 唱片公司想要塑造出一个未来的形象

translation.en: I don't understand. What?
translation.zh: 我没听懂 你在说些什么？

translation.en: Fashion Beat agreed to make Cheri the cover instead.
translation.zh: 《流行节拍》同意把封面换成谢莉了

translation.en: What? Wait.
-Are you serious? -Yeah. She's just more relevant right now.
translation.zh: -你说真的？-对 她现在更有人气

translation.en: -Barry, you can't do this. -It's already done.
translation.zh: -巴里 你不能这么做-木已成舟

translation.en: You look great, by the way.
translation.zh: 顺便说一句 你看起来美极了

translation.en: Hey, Monique.
Grab your stuff.
We're leaving.
-We'll be at your place in 20. -No. I don't want to go to my place.
translation.zh: -我们20分钟后就能到你家了-不 我不想回我家

translation.en: I just wanna get out here, out of the city.
-What do you mean, out of the city? -Just anywhere but here, Mo.
translation.zh: -离开这座城市是什么意思？-除了这里的任何地方

translation.en: Okay, I'm not sure you're thinking clearly. So let me--
translation.zh: 我不确定你现在脑子清不清楚 让我…

translation.en: Let's just go. Where do you want the driver to take us?
translation.zh: -我们走吧-你想让司机在哪里接我们？

translation.en: Just tell him to take the day off. I'll drive.
translation.zh: 让他今天放假吧 我来开车

translation.en: Okay, okay.
-Thank you. Honey. -You're welcome.
[chuckles] You haven't driven anywhere by yourself in over a decade.
translation.zh: 你已经十几年没有自己开车去过任何地方了

translation.en: Okay, fine. You'll drive.
translation.zh: 好吧 那行 你开车

translation.en: Okay.
So remind me again. We're going where exactly?
translation.zh: 再提示我一下我们究竟要去哪里来着？

translation.en: I don't know, Mo. Okay, I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道 小莫 好吧 我不知道

translation.en: Okay. [scoffs] Not that I don't love driving aimlessly when we have a deadline
translation.zh: 好吧 我不是说我不喜欢在完成新歌的期限步步逼近时

translation.en: to finish a new song, but the gala is in a few days.
translation.zh: 还漫无目的地开着车乱窜但距离晚会只差几天了

translation.en: This is not exactly the time to be impulsive.
I just… I need to get away from all this to come back stronger.
translation.zh: 我需要远离这一切才能以更强大的姿态回来

translation.en: Okay, Mo? Just… please, just give me this. Please.
translation.zh: 好吧 小莫 就…拜托你满足我的请求吧

translation.en: That's it.
[Monique] What?
This is where we're gonna go, Mo.
translation.zh: 这就是我们要去的地方 小莫

translation.en: What are talk-- What? What are you talking about?
-Okay, this girl. -Okay.
Last night, I saw this video she posted where she covered one of my songs.
translation.zh: 昨晚 我看了一段她发的视频她翻唱了我的一首歌

translation.en: Mo, her singing and her tribute were so beautiful.
translation.zh: 小莫 她的歌声以及她的表现真的美极了

translation.en: And in the video, she said that she really wished she could meet Angelina.
translation.zh: 她在视频里说她很希望能见到安吉丽娜

translation.en: So, let's go grant her Christmas wish.
translation.zh: 所以 我们去实现她的圣诞愿望吧

translation.en: Why?
Since when do we do house calls for fans?
translation.zh: 我们什么时候开始要给粉丝做上门服务了？

translation.en: It's good business, Mo.
translation.zh: 这是笔好买卖 小莫

translation.en: Meeting a fan and granting her Christmas wish. I mean, come on.
translation.zh: 跟一个粉丝见面实现她的圣诞愿望 拜托

translation.en: I really need this.
I really need to connect with my fans right now.
translation.zh: 我现在真的很需要跟我的粉丝们做些接触

translation.en: I mean, at least they still think I'm relevant.
translation.zh: 至少他们仍然觉得我是有价值的

translation.en: Say I go along with this.
-You will. -I might not.
How do we even find this girl?
translation.zh: 我们要怎么找到这个女孩？

translation.en: What do you mean? She geotagged her pic and hashtagged her high school.
translation.zh: 什么意思？她给照片加了地址还加了她高中的话题

translation.en: She's just a couple hours away.
translation.zh: 她距离这里只有几小时车程

translation.en: Ugh. Social media creeps me out. Whatever.
translation.zh: -社交媒体真叫人毛骨悚然-随便啦

translation.zh: 以及跟你说一声 不用在意

translation.en: I know how it goes.
You know, for the record, it doesn't have to be that way.
translation.zh: 你知道 声明一下一切其实不必这样的

translation.en: There is enough room for both of us, Cheri.
translation.zh: 有足够的市场容纳我们两人 谢莉

translation.en: And…
Look, I don't really know you, but you seem really sweet.
translation.zh: 我不是太了解你但你看起来人真的很好

translation.en: I don't wanna be pitted against you.
I wanna cheer you on.
-I wanna celebrate your wins. -[Cheri squeals with delight]
translation.zh: 我想要为你的胜利喝彩

translation.en: -I wanna cheer you on too. -[Angelina chuckles]
Well, thank you so much for being here.
Where is that guy?
Your boyfriend?
-Oh, uh, Ricardo. That's… That's over. -[Monique scoffs]
translation.zh: 哦 里卡多 我们结束了

translation.en: Oh, bummer.
He played a mean piano.
Oh, Miguel.
Yeah, he… he was never my boyfriend. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 他从来都没当过我的男朋友

translation.en: -Oh, could have fooled me. -Could have fooled all of us.
translation.zh: -都能骗到我了-能骗到我们大家了

translation.en: Well, that's sad because you two are pretty magical together.
translation.zh: 真可惜 因为你们在一起非常般配

translation.en: She ain't wrong.
My favorite musician
once wrote that home is where the heart is, so…
translation.zh: 曾经写过“心在哪里 家就在哪里” 所以…

translation.en: You know what?
I gotta go. [chuckles]
You go. I'll handle it.
[whispers] Okay.
[chuckles] Um, what's happening?
It looks like you're performing tonight, after all.
translation.zh: 看来今晚终归要由你来表演了

translation.en: Break a leg.
Two more minutes. Coming through, guys.
translation.zh: 还有两分钟 来了 各位

translation.en: Ah, thank you.
You ready?
I learn so much from you every day.
translation.zh: 我每天都会在你身上受益良多

translation.en: And you shine brighter than I could have ever imagined.
translation.zh: 你的光芒超出了我的想象

translation.en: I'm so proud of you, mija.
And I'm proud to be your dad.
translation.zh: 我能做你的父亲 我觉得很自豪

translation.en: [tearfully] And your mom would be so proud of you too.
translation.zh: 你妈妈也会为你骄傲的

translation.en: [Conchi] Ladies and gentlemen,
family, and honored guests,
I present to you
Cristina Adriana Torres, La Quinceañera!
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂娜阿德里亚娜托雷斯15岁成人礼的主角

translation.en: ♪ I know, I know You're here to stay ♪
Thanks for everything, Dad.
translation.zh: 谢谢你所做的一切 爸爸

translation.en: I just hope it's everything you dreamed.
translation.zh: 我只希望这就是你希望得到的

translation.en: Even more.
-But, Dad? -Yes?
You should call her.
-[Miguel] Hey! -Hey.
Yes! Yeah!
-[Cristina] Yay! -[Angelina exclaims]
You look amazing! [laughs]
Best quince ever!
Oh, good!
And…
now you can finally have yours. [giggles]
translation.zh: 现在你终于能过你的成年礼了

translation.en: Thank you.
-Hey. -Hey.
-Do you wanna dance? -Yes! [giggles]
What about SNL?
Oh, you know, I told them I already had plans.
translation.zh: 你知道的我跟他们说 我已经有安排了

translation.en: You sure you're not just looking for a pianist?
translation.zh: 你确定你不只是要找钢琴师吗？

translation.en: Nope.
You said something about making plans?
Yeah, I'm, um, still working on those.
translation.zh: 是啊 我还在努力呢

translation.en: Maybe you can help me.
Maybe. What are you doing for Christmas?
translation.zh: 也许吧 你圣诞节有什么安排？

translation.en: Christmas?
-With you? -[chuckling]
Oh, you're gonna have to get a sweater though.
A real ugly one.
Oh, I got a line on those.
And, um…
after?
We'll figure it out.
[Angelina] Mira, we're number one!
♪ I was always thinking of The things that could go wrong ♪
translation.zh: （公告牌百大假日热门榜） 我总是不停杞人忧天

translation.en: ♪ And I'm always stuck inside my head ♪
translation.zh: 我总被困在自己的思绪中

translation.en: ♪ Leaving all my feels unsaid ♪
translation.zh: 绝口不提我的所有感受

translation.en: ♪ Now you got me on the edge ♪
♪ 'Cause I've been hoping That you're wantin' me to stay ♪
translation.zh: 因为我一直希望你想让我留下

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause I don't want this Christmas To be just another day ♪
translation.zh: 因为我不愿让今年圣诞平凡度过

translation.en: ♪ I've tried to hide this love inside ♪
translation.zh: 我曾试过将这份爱深埋于心

translation.en: ♪ But there can be No Christmas without you ♪
translation.zh: 因为没有你 圣诞也无从说起

translation.en: ♪ Is it too late for me to say ♪
♪ That there can be No Christmas without you? ♪
translation.zh: 没有你 圣诞也无从说起 （完）
